name: Pink Heart
baseMeaning: A pink heart, representing love, affection, and femininity.
tldr: Soft love, femininity, or gentle affection.

contextMeanings.meaning: Expressing gentle, soft love or affection.
Associated with feminine aesthetics and softness.
Rarely used ironically due to its sweetness.

platformNotes.note: Popular in soft aesthetic and K-pop communities.
Common in feminine and romantic posts.
Used in coquette and soft girl aesthetics.

generationalNotes.note: Associated with soft aesthetics and gentle vibes.
May not be familiar with this newer emoji.
